scripts.lint:firefox: npm run build && web-ext lint --source-dir build/firefox/
scripts.start:firefox: npm run build && web-ext run --source-dir build/firefox/ --firefox
scripts.start:chrome: npm run build && web-ext run --source-dir build/chrome/ --target chromium
scripts.publish:firefox: npm run build && web-ext build --source-dir build/firefox/ --overwrite-dest
